about_the_game:
Beyond the limits of sanity, sometimes you need a deranged criminal to bring order and justice. Splatter and humiliate your enemies in Re-Loaded, an unhinged multidirectional shooter classic.

A psychotic supervillain with matter manipulation powers named F.U.B (Fat Ugly Boy) has escaped to the deserted planet ‘Kee-Butt-5’ where he has been looking to increase his power with body modification and implants. Through these twisted new modifications, he evolves into an even more monstrous villain named C.H.E.B (Charming Handsome Erudite Bastard). It is here that his final transformation threatens to engulf the entire planet into a nightmare reflection of himself. You play as one of a set of six former convicts who are dead set on ending this villain’s plans as brutally as possible.

Whether ripping through hordes as a disturbed diaper wearing man with a plasma gun, or perhaps as an android nun assassin, you will find a character with skills to match your playstyle. Explore the many ways to paint a room with blood and brains as you navigate the game in many various demented environments. Complete your objectives across multiple levels utilizing a variety of deadly weapons, such as cannons, lasers, and ultra bombs.

Regardless of what depraved methods you choose, C.H.E.B must die.

  • Classic multi-directional shooting gameplay.
  • Six stylish and bizarre characters to choose from.
  • Twelve varied blood-soaked levels to tear into.
  • Fully 3D environments with lots of exploration.
  • Morphing Terrain with the use of high-powered weaponry and explosives.
  • Relentless enemy hordes to maim and kill.
  • Local Multi-Player support.
